channel.title: 317beta [RuneSource][Revision 30]
channel.description:
[u][b]Intro & Goals[/b][/u] I'm so excited, I think this is a project that I'll actually finish. I have decided to do this project mainly because I want to see what I can actually do, reach my full potential, start out on a base other than what I'm comfortable with, and beyond my level. I may even host it once I'm done adding content!
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] Just started like two weeks ago so not many, but I hope to accomplish much more.
[ul][li][b]Array packet loading (no more large switch statements..)[/b][/li] [li][b]Cycle-based tasks (Thanks graham)[/b][/li] [li][b]Packaged[/b][/li] [li][b]Global items (Just needs respawning)[/b][/li] [li][b]Private messaging (small bug that needs fixing - fixed!)[/b][/li] [li][b]Python script loading (thanks zyle)[/b][/li] [li][b]Item pickup[/b][/li] [li][b]Objects[/b][/li] [li][b]XML[/b][/li] [li][b]Item dropping[/b][/li] [li][b]Item re-spawning[/b][/li] [li][B]Following[/B][/li] [li][B]Item On Item[/B][/li] [li][B]Item On Object[/B][/li] [li][B]Location System[/B][/li] [li][B]Interface equipment changes[/B][/li] [li][B]Stackables[/B][/li] [li][B]Combat[/B][/li] [li][B]Skill system (leveling up, xp)[/B][/li] [li][B]Graphics (GFX)[/B][/li] [li][B]Walk-To Action System[/B][/li] [li][B]NPC Spawning[/B][/li] [li][B]Special Attack Bar[/B][/li] [li][B]GFX's working[/B][/li] [li][B]Emotes working[/B][/li] [li][B]Force chat working[/B][/li] [li][B]Facing entities or directions[/B][/li] [li][B]hit splats(still working out a small issue)[/B][/li][/ul]
So much to do, I don't even know where to start sometimes :)
[u][b]Pictures[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar2.png[/img][IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/mopar7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/pickup-item.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/beta1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/beta1-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/force-chat-beta.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/alch-gif-beta-2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/alch-gif-beta.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/hitsplats-gif-beta.gif[/img]
[u][b]Plan[/b][/u] I plan to release different revisions of this (currently on revision 8) where I feel as if enough has been done where people will actually use this. I will update the topic title accordingly to what revision I'm on.
[u][b]Credits (No specific order)[/b][/u] [b]blakeman8192[/b] I Roll Deep Graham

item.title: 317beta [RuneSource][Revision 30]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

runewings317:

Wow… You must be putting a ton of time into this… Lol.

Eh, not that much. Haven’t actually worked on this in two days. I just do a lot of things when I do work, because I know exactly what I need to add. Hahaha.

I’ve figured out why I couldn’t get stackables to work. I’ve thought of a solution for this, so I’ll implement it today or tomorrow and test everything.

Read full topic

item.title: 317beta [RuneSource][Revision 30]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

thanks <3

Revision 30

  • Re-added blake’s plugin system, thinking of potential uses for it.

It was all about player state updating today. Decided to hold off NPC’s until tomorrow.

  • GFX’s working
  • Emotes working
  • Force chat working
  • Facing entities or directions
  • hit splats (still working out a small issue)

item.title: 317beta [RuneSource][Revision 30]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

been updating this on r-s a lot, totally forgot to update on here

What’s new in revision 14

[ul][li]Item dropping fully completed[/li]
[li]Need to sort out a small bug with objects and it’ll be ready[/li]
[li]Ground item processing almost ready[/li]
[li]Started on following[/li]
[li]Lots of other little bugs and issues sorted out[/li][/ul]

Actual media will come when I’ve finished all the ‘common server’ needs (dropping items, picking up items, trading, following, etc.)

Revision 17

[ul][li][color=green]Item On Item[/li]
[li][color=green]Item On Object[/li]
[li][color=green]Item On Floor Item[/li]
[li][color=green]Object loading (XML)[/li]
[li][color=green]Object clicks[/li]
[li][color=green]Global object system[/li][/ul]

I’m really happy. I made a lot of progress today with packets and objects.

Gonna work on Item definitions, and then I’m going to complete the packets, and lastly, I’ll work on stackables.

Once I do that and fix all the bugs, time to add content! and that’s the fun part :hurr:

Revision 24

  • improved GeometricRegion class added to server
    - whole world system implemented
  • interface equips

Couldn’t fit all into this picture, but you get the idea. I’m hoping to have npc spawning done by tomorrow too.

Read full topic

item.title: 317beta [RuneSource][Revision 30]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Intro & Goals
I’m so excited, I think this is a project that I’ll actually finish. I have decided to do this project mainly because I want to see what I can actually do, reach my full potential, start out on a base other than what I’m comfortable with, and beyond my level. I may even host it once I’m done adding content!

Features
Just started like two weeks ago so not many, but I hope to accomplish much more.

[ul][li]Array packet loading (no more large switch statements…)[/li]
[li]Cycle-based tasks (Thanks graham)[/li]
[li]Packaged[/li]
[li]Global items (Just needs respawning)[/li]
[li]Private messaging (small bug that needs fixing - fixed!)[/li]
[li]Python script loading (thanks zyle)[/li]
[li]Item pickup[/li]
[li]Objects[/li]
[li]XML[/li]
[li]Item dropping[/li]
[li]Item re-spawning[/li]
[li]Following[/li]
[li]Item On Item[/li]
[li]Item On Object[/li]
[li]Location System[/li]
[li]Interface equipment changes[/li]
[li]Stackables[/li]
[li]Combat[/li]
[li]Skill system (leveling up, xp)[/li]
[li]Graphics (GFX)[/li]
[li]Walk-To Action System[/li]
[li]NPC Spawning[/li]
[li]Special Attack Bar[/li]
[li]GFX’s working[/li]
[li]Emotes working[/li]
[li]Force chat working[/li]
[li]Facing entities or directions[/li]
[li]hit splats(still working out a small issue)[/li][/ul]

So much to do, I don’t even know where to start sometimes

Pictures











Plan
I plan to release different revisions of this (currently on revision 8) where I feel as if enough has been done where people will actually use this. I will update the topic title accordingly to what revision I’m on.

Credits (No specific order)
blakeman8192
I Roll Deep
Graham
